page.title: 12SHOPS AND SHOPPING.
page.content: There are two shops in the survey area.One is called{Harby Village {Stores}and is owned by Mr.Archer and the other is the{Post Office}which is owned by Mr.& Mrs.Saddington.They both sell similar goods,such as sweets,groceries,food and such like. Most people do their weekly shopping at Nottingham,Grantham,Melton Mowbray, or Leicester.The nearest hypermarket is{Asda}at West Bridgeford.Many people shop there since there is a wider choice of products and also it is cheaper than the local shops. There are many mobile shops that visit the area. {Butchers:}Mr.D.Cox;Mr.Pears.Mr.Lumb. {Bakers:}Mr.Allan;Mr.Henfry;Mrs.Spinks. {Green Grocer:}Mr.Dewey. {Chip Van:}Mr Fisher. {Fresh Fish:}Mr.Deacon.(Grimsby). {Pie Van:}Mr Watkins.(Grantham).
